componentviewer.config.advanced_tooltips: Whether debug option advanced tooltips has to be enabled to display components.
componentviewer.config.changed_component: Whether only changed components will be displayed (like using /data get).
componentviewer.config.display.tooltip:
Specifies the display behavior of components.


Never: Components will never be displayed.

Hold: Components will be displayed when holding CTRL.

Always: Components will always be displayed.
componentviewer.config.ignore_errors.too:
Whether incorrect formatting will still be displayed.

[Mode: Class]
componentviewer.config.indent_size.toolt: Specifies the amount of whitespaces used for indentation. Zero means no formatting occurs.
componentviewer.config.mode.tooltip:
Specifies the display mode of components.


NBT: Using a NBT representation.

Class: Using java's built-in representation for classes, records, integers, etc.
componentviewer.config.title: Component Viewer Config
componentviewer.tooltips.components.head: Components:
componentviewer.tooltips.formatter.error: A formatting error occurred: Displaying non-formatted component value.
